page.title: 07GOVERNMENT IN THE AREA.
page.content: the bottom rung of government is the civil parish council, and this area has several. the northern part of the block comes into hampshire and is included in the bramshott and liphook parish. south of th county border a very small area in the west of the block is in rogate parish but the main area is in milland parish, which has a council of nine elected members. linch has a parish meeting and the extreme western bit of the block is in linchmere parish. all these south of the county boundary are subject to the chichester county council, each of which has a member representingthe area. this part of sussex is represented in parliament by the member for chichester who is at present mr.anthony nelson, conservative.
